unnormalised: Hoping for swift recoveries for all athletes impacted. The updates on Jasprit Bumrah's back are concerning. Let's hope the NCA physios can get him back to full fitness soon. Also, wishing Rishabh Pant strength as he continues his rehabilitation. Remember "Chak De! India"? Resilience is key. Every km counts in this journey back. Let's trust the BCCI's medical team & their expertise. Wishing them all strength, like the Himalayas. Let's get those Ws, Rs.
